explanation: Electric field on equatorial line is opposite to dipole moment. Force on negative charge is opposite to field, so along dipole moment ($+\hat{i}$ direction). Torque $\vec{\tau} = \vec{r} \times \vec{F}$ gives $-\hat{k}$ direction.
